title: Bad Daddy
description: While I was in my second year at Hawthorne University, desperate for cash, I took a job that would make most people blush. I never told anyone about that deal I’d made with the man I still fantasized about or the three thousand dollars I pocketed just for meeting him.Fresh out of college, I’m heading back home to stay with my mom while I search for a job and try to get on my feet.I was never supposed to see him again after I graduated. Especially not in my childhood home that he now owns.He told me to call him daddy. I want to call him mine.CONTAINS: DADDY KINK, VIRGIN, DD/LG, ROLEPLAYBad Daddy is a novella in the Quick and Dirty Series. If you like a short and sweet story with instalove and a happily ever after, this book is for you. Every book in the series is completely standalone. Be warned – the sex in this is raw and taboo. It is not for the faint of heart. Now dive in, you dirty little kitten.
author: Nova Monroe
